name: Epic Battle: Angry Gangster Ci
description:
Epic Battle: Angry Gangster City is a grand auto car stunt game to practice your craze for playing gangster hero in this immoral mafia city. Shoot like a rifleman & protect yourself from the wild street thugs of the town. Stay away from the crooked enemies & street crime that can distract you from your missions.
Features:
- Open world environment
- Thrilling game missions
- Realistic HD graphics
- Different characters to select
- Time based missions and tasks
- Map direction to navigate into Miami city
